identifier: paradise screens - pool and patio enclosures:dallas, tx

data.name: Paradise Screens - Pool and Patio Enclosures

reviews.text: Great company and nothing but 100% quality products and installation.  Had 3 motorized screens installed on my patio and they turn out great.  Micah and his team are fabulous to work with, and I would highly recommend if in the market for patio screens.

I could not be happier with Paradise screens, Micah went above and beyond in every way from scheduling, design, construction and then cleanup they exceeded all of our expectations! They are very professional, knowledgeable and hard working. It’s always a little nerve wracking hiring a new contractor but I can tell you that you have nothing to worry about with these guys!

I would absolutely recommend Micah and Paradise Screens to any and everybody that is desiring to turn their space into a bug free, much more enjoyable paradise. I'll first start with his presentation, I interviewed at least 4 different companies but none presented themselves as professionally as he did. I, without the need to see any of his work in person, felt that he would do a great job and did he ever!!! His work is even better than I hoped it would be! His prices are very competitive but hi

Micah of Paradise Screens is an incredible young man! He’s warm, friendly, knowledgeable, responsive and most of all a MAGICIAN at his work! It’s his passion and my photos will tell the story my words can’t!

He made my dream come true with this patio enclosure - I’m still speechless!!!

The additional concrete was added when I moved inn bc of flooding! He was able to enclose it all and open my space even bigger!!

I’m in LOVE! Highly recommend Micah for your work!

It was smooth from start to f
Micah installed a screen on my patio. He did a great job. I am highly recomand him. I love my patio ,no more bugs.

Paradise Screens is a life changer!  Micah and his team did outstanding work on our patio by building the most beautiful Lanai ever!  He has transformed our home into one that we can truly enjoy for a long time.  Our Lanai has added an additional living space that we can absolutely love!

Micah has definitely exceeded our expectations and continues to do so even after the work was completed. I requested an additional roller screen to protect against the sun during the hottest point of the day an

Look no further. Micah and this business are perfection. We had him "blind" half of our lanai and knew right away we wanted him to complete the other half. It has added an outdoor room to our home. We were blessed that other contractors did not respond to us. There is none better than Micah and Paradise Screens. He is always available to you and, again, the work is perfection. Thank you Micah.

So happy with how my motorized screens turned out! I was tired of the thin magnetic closing screens that would only last about a year. The material would get brittle and my dog kept running through the screens and tearing them. These are heavy duty and seal so the bugs will stay out. The paint for the frame rails and motor were a perfect match and blend right into our trim. Micah was great to work with and made the whole process quick and easy. Definitely recommend these guys and will use them a

I waited a year to give my review, partly because we had some things that needed to be fixed and I wanted to see how that went. I will now say Micah and his team are top notch customer service! Micah is extremely knowledgeable on his products and they are very responsive in their customer service! Extremely happy with our screen!

Micah was seamless to work with. He was very prompt with all his responses. Micah and his team showed up on a Saturday in the blazing Texas heat and completed our screened porch 2 weeks earlier than expected! I can’t brag on this company enough! We have enjoyed a space that was otherwise neglected for 3 years until we crossed paths with Paradise Screens!

I highly recommend Paradise Screens. They did an excellent job installing a privacy wall on my back porch. Very dependable and professional. Micah was very responsive to our questions and the job was completed in a timely manner. Locally and family owned business.

I had a great experience with Micah, he came out to fix my motorized screen. From first contact over the phone to him coming out and taking care of my patio, the communication was excellent—quick responses, clear updates, and punctual arrival. The service itself was top-notch—everything was handled efficiently and with care. Highly recommend for anyone needing reliable and professional screen repair!

I had a great experience with Paradise Screens. They are prompt, professional, and very reasonably priced. I had a few rooms that the summer heat was making these rooms uncomfortable, even with air conditioning. They responded timely, helped choose a great screen color for my exterior home and turn around time was great. I’m extremely happy with my purchase and definitely recommend this company for a great customer experience and superior quality product. My rooms are much cooler!

Micah with Paradise Screen came to our home today and did an outstanding job enclosing our patio with a screen. From start to finish, he was professional, friendly, and delivered exactly what he promised. The quality of his workmanship is phenomenal — everything looks clean, sturdy, and well-finished. My wife and I are extremely happy with the results!

Thanks to his work, our kids can now play in the patio area without us worrying about bugs, and it’s quickly become one of our favorite parts of

Micah came out and put a permanent screen up on our patio. Not only was it hot but extremely windy. Micah did a fantastic job and took the time to ensure my wife and I were satisfied with everything before finishing up. He was detailed and his work spoke for itself. I would highly recommend them to anyone.

Paradise Screens did a great job re-screening my large screened porch. Micah communicated well throughout the entire process and the price was very reasonable.  I would definitely recommend this company.

Love love love our patio louvered wall! Excellent product and workmanship throughout. Micah and his crew are top notch in their field and we highly recommend them to anyone looking for an elegant touch to their outdoor paradise.

The Paradise Screen team, led by Micah are professional and knowledgeable about Texas. They communicated arrival time, did the work quickly and cleaned up after the job was done.  Highly recommend Paradise Screens.  We have  a large screened-in porch which they repaired the wind damage efficiently and with top quality workmanship.

100% reliable, fast paced, clean work space  during work and after completion, very transparent. Honest from the first phone call.  Was able to tear down and replace all screening from hail damage in one day.

Paradise Screens did a great job screening in our patio. Communication was outstanding, they offer a wide variety of material choices and options, their pricing is competitive, timeliness was quick, and overall quality of the job performance was superb! We will definitely use them again for any of our screen needs and 100% recommend!
